body.name: 2PCS Yoni Oil Organic Feminine Oil Vaginal Moisturizer - Ph Balance for Women - Feminine Deodorant - Eliminates Odor with Pineapple Essential Oil, All Natural Oil, 1 fl oz/PC
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 10 mins
features: 【All-in-One Organic Feminine Oil 】BASSI yoni oil feminine oil is for your daily vaginal health and optimal hygiene needs. Our intimate oil formulated by our certified herbalist, this fusion of natural essential oils helps maintain Ph balance for women, soothes skin, ease discomfort, irritation and itchiness, keeps your skin moisturized, gently cleanses, stimulates and moisturizes the feminine area, leaving it supple and free of any odors. And keeps your V smelling like fresh flower or fruits.

【100% Natural & Fresh Skin Every Day】BASSI quality feminine oil is made of Pineapple essential oil, rose essential oil, safflower essential oil, grape seed oil, sandalwood and other plant extract essential oil. Specially made to eliminate/balance odor-causing agents and It supports your body’s defenses while leaving a fruit and floral scent. You can also use it as an ingrown hair oil to deter the growth of ingrown hair.

【Improve Feminine Intimate Elasticity】BASSI yoni oil feminine care oil is rich in antioxidants and provides effective relief from dryness, itch and remove odor resulting from workouts and menstruation while also promoting skin tone / elasticity and eliminating odor, sweetening your sacred petals with the fresh and clean fragrance.

【For Women, By Women】BASSI intimate essential oil for woman is 100% organic, hypoallergenic moisturizer oil that can help combat symptoms of BV, and menopause. The ingredients were carefully selected for their time-tested effectiveness in gently treating feminine issues like vaginal dryness, irritation and itchiness.

【Easy to use 】 You can drip the yoni oil for women ph balance and wetness on panty liners, directly on panties or just apply yoni essential oils directly on skin of your vulva after bathing until completely absorbed without the need of washing off. Shake well before each use for maximum scent .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SMELLS SO GOOD
reviews.reviewText: Funny thing happened…I started using Yoni Oil more than a year ago..my first purchase was a bundle from a company that pestered me so much I blocked them…I got a thing about buying what I want, or need…when I decide I want, or need it…and not being harassed into making a purchase…Anywho, I shop Amazon because Amazon has the recipe; quality products, fair prices, respectful customer service 24/7/365…my bad to the review…how do you say you’re very lonely without saying you’re very lonely…Anywho, I’m conducting research…this will be my first experience using pineapple…it smells delicious…I’m on a quest to smell like a pina colada at all times… I’m ordering the matching scented wash, and I’ll get back to this later…p.s. Amazon is a wonderful stress free place to shop…your supported and treated like an individual…don’t like it? don’t fit? Send it back and we’ll be right here for you as you continue on this journey, and we’re happy to be a part of it.I WILL UPDATE 30 DAYS FROM ACTUAL START💜…can we really talk about it…education is needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Unlike other reviews say that it smells delicious - I don't find it delicious. It barely smells, it's a neutral smell, there is almost no pineapple smell. I've used it as directed - there were some different ways how to use it and I used it by putting a few drops onto my underwear. I am not sure that I've noticed that it did something. Maybe I didn't even need to use this product in general. I hope this oil really will help someone.

reviews.reviewText: The pineapple smells great and the product isn’t too oily.

reviews.reviewText: Pineapple Yoni! This amazing product is great for your Yoni (Lady bits) if you’re looking for a product to help keep the moisture locked in & help with your natural ph this is definitely a product you should try. I absolutely love the scent & texture of this Yoni oil. It’s the perfect consistency & thickness as you can see if my photos the oil is a great thick consistency to cover your bits & keep them lubricators in the healthiest & most comfortable way. Great product, scent, & value for your money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for staying moisturized!
reviews.reviewText: I'm definitely a fan of this Yoni oil. It's priced efficiently as it comes with 2 bottles, and it's been great for helping me stay moisturized! I've definitely seen a decrease in skin irritation from shaving since I started using this. It smells nice too. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got the pineapple a few weeks ago. I used it shook if up there is no scent. I don’t know if I got a bad batch but you have to see when you get yours if the smell is just not there where it should smell like sweet pineapple. I am glad I tried it but won’t buy it due to know pineapple smell, maybe there will improve that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Where's the Pineapple?
reviews.reviewText: I use Yoni Oils for a nice feminine touch—sometimes via a couple drops on a panty liner, others via direct application on the skin--and looked forward to using this product. Unfortunately, the Pineapple scent is barely there; I almost had to put my nose IN the bottle just to smell the fragrance. On the other hand, I don’t want any strong smells (neither good or bad) to emanate from my nether regions, nor would I want to put a heavily scented oil in that area. Still, a similar rose oil I’ve tried before didn’t have that issue so I know this product can be improved. This Yoni oil moisturized well without any irritation; however, due to the ghost scent, I rated it 3 stars.
